: : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
Rodimus Prime: Hello Battera. A Predacon spy  kidnapped my...
Rodimus glanced at his daughter and back.
Rodimus Prime: My wife. They have reprogrammed her to serve their cause.
Rodimus hands Elita over to Kup.
Rodimus Prime: Hey "uncle" Kup, could you watch her while I head to the CRs?
Kup: Sure thing Roddy.
Rodimus heads off to a CR chamber.
Kup: He is really hurting.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Battera::

She walked over and put a reassuring hand on Rodimus' shoulder. "My 
new friend, my name is Battera. Who has taken your loved one?"
